name: api_physics_WheelCollider
description: A special collider for vehicle wheels.

properties.name: brakeTorque
properties.description: Brake torque expressed in Newton metres.

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center of the wheel, measured in the object's local space.

properties.name: forceAppPointDistance
properties.description: Application point of the suspension and tire forces measured from the base of the resting wheel.

properties.name: forwardFriction
properties.description: Properties of tire friction in the direction the wheel is pointing in.

properties.name: isGrounded
properties.description: Indicates whether the wheel currently collides with something (Read Only).

properties.name: mass
properties.description: The mass of the wheel, expressed in kilograms. Must be larger than zero. Typical values would be in

properties.name: motorTorque
properties.description: Motor torque on the wheel axle expressed in Newton metres. Positive or negative depending on directi

properties.name: radius
properties.description: The radius of the wheel, measured in local space.

properties.name: rotationSpeed
properties.description: Rotation speed of the wheel, measured in degrees per second.

properties.name: rpm
properties.description: Current wheel axle rotation speed, in rotations per minute (Read Only).

properties.name: sidewaysFriction
properties.description: Properties of tire friction in the sideways direction.

properties.name: sprungMass
properties.description: The mass supported by this WheelCollider.

properties.name: steerAngle
properties.description: Steering angle in degrees, always around the local y-axis.

properties.name: suspensionDistance
properties.description: Maximum extension distance of wheel suspension, measured in local space.

properties.name: suspensionExpansionLimited
properties.description: Limits the expansion velocity of the Wheel Collider's suspension. If you set this property on a Rigi

properties.name: suspensionSpring
properties.description: The parameters of wheel's suspension. The suspension attempts to reach a target position by applying

properties.name: wheelDampingRate
properties.description: The damping rate of the wheel. Must be larger than zero.

properties.name: ConfigureVehicleSubsteps
properties.description: Configure vehicle sub-stepping parameters.

properties.name: GetGroundHit
properties.description: Gets ground collision data for the wheel.

properties.name: GetWorldPose
properties.description: Gets the world space pose of the wheel accounting for ground contact, suspension limits, steer angle
